about_the_game:
The full soundtrack for Small Saga!

This album features 83 pieces of music by Darya Noghani, Kofi Young, and Evelyn Lark in high bitrate mp3 format. This includes:
  • Over twenty battle themes
  • Four songs performed by Kofi, the rat bard of Murida
  • Baroque piano solos, celtic rock jamming sessions, and... apocalyptic drum and bass?
  • A digital booklet featuring a full track list and lyrics for all vocal tracks.
